lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Bosworth said he expected current high domestic liquidity to be drawn down during the next six months with some corresponding upward pressure on interest rates, now at about nine pct.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He said that more than 60 pct of today's 50 mln people are said to live below the poverty line and official predictions suggest the population will double within the next three decades.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Bosworth said much hope had been placed on the land reform program promised by President Corazon Aquino, but he warned it was not a complete cure for the country's ills.
